backupInfo.description: Manual backup before proceeding with website changes

sourceCode.src: Complete source code directory with all components, pages, layouts, and utilities

changesMade.description: Backup created before implementing dynamic sidebar article logic
keyChanges: Updated AIBuzzLayout.astro to use dynamic sidebar article slicing
Fixed Sanity queries to properly fetch slug.current
Implemented non-repeating articles between main grid and sidebar

steps: 1. Stop the current Astro dev server
2. Copy all files from this backup directory to the project root
3. Run 'npm install' to ensure dependencies are correct
4. Restart the Astro dev server with 'npm run dev'
